its csgo got nothing to say

While CSGO is a fun game to watch and play, the competitive aspect of the game is completely ruined by rampant cheating and a company whose sole purpose is to suck the game dry and make as much money as possible. The game is not balanced at all, there is still total randomness purposely within the game (so its more fun for people who are casual) it is not Hardcore or a completely skill based game like 1.6; where if you were legit skillful at the game you were capable of completely out classing all of the other players and pretty much never losing. 

I have played CS games since the first beta and have sunk over 10,000 hours into 1.6 alone. We need a game more like 1.6 and less like CSGO, but i don't think that day will ever come as CSGO seems like it will be the last installment in this once great competitive shooter.

I like this game de fou

i bought this game about 3-4 years ago and it was one of the first games I ever played on pc, other than hearthstone and some others. As I played this game more and more over the years I got better gradually and even when i first started out, getting only a single kill would be so satisfying. The Community can be toxic at times but I have met tons and tons of amazing and hilarious people in csgo. Another thing is the skins that they add with every case. The skins seem to be getting better and cooler with each case but nothing can beat the original skins of cs.

Fun game. You can play casual or competitive. If you are going to play competitive playing free can have lots of hackers so please stop complaining and spend money on the game just like all the other people who play the game competitively.
